body.text:
{% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Batutuwan da aka zaba: Bleeding Gums/Bakin Mai Jini 
Zaɓi tambayoyin cikin jerin da ke ƙasa, don samun shawarwarin kula da baki

 1. A yayin goge baki
 2. Kunburaren jan dadashi
 3. Ruwan gyambo
 4. Dadashi mara dandano{%else%}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Selected Topic: Bleeding gums

 Choose an option.

 1. General Bleeding gums.
 2. Reddish swollen gums.
 3. Liquid pus.
 4. Bad taste gums{%endif%}

rows.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}A yayin goge baki{%else%}General Bleeding gums{%endif%}
rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Dadashi na na yin jini idan ina goge baki{%else%}My gums bleed when I brush{%endif%}

sections.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Bakin Mai Jini: 2{%else%}Bleeding gums: 2{%endif%}

rows.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Kumburi{%else%}Reddish swollen gums{%endif%}
rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Dadashi na sun kumbura kuma sun yi ja{%else%}My gums are swollen and red.{%endif%}

sections.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Bakin Mai Jini: 3{%else%}Bleeding gums: 3{%endif%}

rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Ruwan gyambo na fitowa a baki na ta inda suka hadu da hakora{%else%}Liquid pus comes from my gums where they meet the teeth.{%endif%}
